idea-plugin.name: Spring Transaction Inspector
idea-plugin.description:
Spring Transaction Inspector

An IntelliJ IDEA plugin that detects potential issues with Spring @Transactional annotations through static analysis.

Key Features

  • Transaction Visualization - Gutter icons to identify transactional methods at a glance
  • AOP Proxy Bypass Detection - Warns when calling @Transactional methods within the same class
  • Invalid Usage Detection - Detects @Transactional on private/final/static methods
  • N+1 Query Detection - Identifies potential N+1 issues in loops and streams with LAZY collections
  • Quick Fixes - Automatic fix suggestions for common issues
  • Customization - Settings UI to enable/disable specific features

Usage

  1. Open a Spring project
  2. Write code with @Transactional annotations
  3. Automatically displays warnings and icons
  4. Customize settings in Settings > Tools > Spring Transaction Inspector
